mods.abstract: One color offset printing plate (black on silver) advertising Dottie West and containing a biography of her life and accomplishments. The plate features a photograph of Dottie West and describes her childhood, time in college, marriage to Bill West, life in Cleveland, subsequent move to Nashville, musical accomplishments including winning a 1964 Grammy, and later honors.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
